solution_line_template: He listens to {hours_per_day}*{minutes_per_hour}=<<{hours_per_day}*{minutes_per_hour}={minutes_per_day}>>{minutes_per_day} minutes of music a day
So he hears {beats_per_minute}*{minutes_per_day}=<<{beats_per_minute}*{minutes_per_day}={beats_per_day}>>{beats_per_day} beats per day
That means he hears {beats_per_day}*{days_per_week}=<<{beats_per_day}*{days_per_week}={beats_per_week}>>{beats_per_week} beats per week
